getTweets.describe: Makes a Get Tweets API call

getTweetsStarted.describe: Begins the Get Tweets API Call. No payload.

getTweetsSucceeded.describe: Called when the Get Tweets API call completes, passing the data as a payload.

getTweetsFailed.describe: Called when the Get Tweets API Call fails, delivering a standard error message.

getTodos.describe: Makes a Get Todos API call

getTodosStarted.describe: Begins the Get Todos API Call. No payload.

getTodosSucceeded.describe: Called when the Get Todos API call completes, passing the data as a payload.

getTodosFailed.describe: Called when the Get Todos API Call fails, delivering a standard error message.
